richly.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if something is richly decorated, it is decorated a lot, in a way that is beautiful
richly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a cloak richly embroidered with gold thread
richly.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if someone is richly dressed, they are dressed in expensive clothes
richly.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: an area that is richly endowed with wildlife
